title: Position of devices for short-circuit protection
fullText:
In accordance with Clause 2.5.1.3, a device providing protection against short-circuit shall be installed at the origin of every circuit and at each point where a reduction occurs in the current-carrying capacity of the conductors.
Exception: In accordance with the conditions set out in Clauses 2.5.4.4 and 2.5.4.5, a short-circuit protective device may be located in another position or may be omitted.
NOTE: Such devices may be circuit-breakers with a short-circuit release or HRC fuses.
